Package eventorganizer

Class Event

java.lang.Object
eventorganizer.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Event>
public class Event extends Object implements Comparable<Event>
This class represents an event with attributes including: date, timeslot, location, contact information, and duration. This class contains methods for comparing events based on these attributes using the equals() and compareTo() methods.
Author:
Jason Lei, Jerlin Yuen

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      The equals() method determines if two dates, timeslots and locations of an event are equal.
      Overrides:

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Event event)
      The compareTo() method first compares the dates of two events, then the timeslots if the dates are the same
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Event>
      Parameters:
      event - - specific event
      Returns:
      0 if the dates and timeslots are the same, 1 if a date/timeslot is larger than the other, -1 if a date/timeslot is smaller than the other
